column5:
ハハハハハ\n
ジライアよ！　くやしいか？\n
二度と　大門教に　さからわぬよう
column6:
Bwahahahaha! This is what happens when you defy the Cult of Daimon!\n
Are you mad, Ziria? I bet you are!

column5:
このムテキオーさまに　虫ケラのごとく\n
ひねりつぶされた　きろくを\n
みずからの手で　きざむが　よい！
column6: I, Mutekiou, have crushed the Fire Hero like a bug! Such an overwhelming defeat deserves to be written down!
